applications.name: Lenny
applications.description: I love cats and live in an apartment. I don't want Larry to stress about Garfield.  I will give him a loving home.

applications.name: April
applications.description: I used to have a cat that looks like Garfield.  I am ready for a cat again and would love to adopt.  I have a large home where I can set up a big cat tree for Garfield so he can watch birds out the window.
